actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolves that the Senate disapproved the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for legislative and executive salaries that were transmitted to the Congress during February 1974, pursuant to Section 225(h) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Declares that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for legislative and executive salaries that were transmitted to the Congress during February 1974, pursuant to the Salary Act of 1967.

titles.title: Resolves that the Senate disapproved the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for legislative and executive salaries that were transmitted to the Congress during February 1974, pursuant to Section 225(h) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.
